title: ThomasGD
author: ThomasGD
content: Hey, I am Thomas, the lead CM at Marketing10. We have an exceptionally experienced community management team, with a strong background in the dynamic world of Web3. I have been operating as CM since 2018, and as a marketing team have had the privilege of working with tier 1 projects. With a passion for community engagement and a wealth of industry knowledge, we are committed to delivering exceptional results in every project we undertake. We look forward to taking your project to the next level.If you are looking for a CM that you can trust, I am the right person. My monthly contract price is 500 $ /month.Interested? Let's book a Zoom call where I will present to you what I can bring in!

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: That's all well and good, but do you have any experience in the crypto world? It seems to me that you have a lot of competition around here, and not mentioning anything about Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies seems like a disadvantage. On the other hand, I would say that here in the forum you pay more for projects than a monthly flat fee, which is what you are proposing. But, hey, good luck with your pitch.

comments.author: ThomasGD
comments.body: Quote from: Poker Player on August 22, 2023, 07:55:08 AMThat's all well and good, but do you have any experience in the crypto world? It seems to me that you have a lot of competition around here, and not mentioning anything about Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies seems like a disadvantage. On the other hand, I would say that here in the forum you pay more for projects than a monthly flat fee, which is what you are proposing. But, hey, good luck with your pitch.Yes, I am working for a marketing firm that has 7 employees with different backgrounds. All I can say is that we are one of the best in the whole space. For interested people we are going to show everything on the Zoom call

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: ThomasGD on August 22, 2023, 07:51:03 PMYes, I am working for a marketing firm that has 7 employees with different backgrounds. All I can say is that we are one of the best in the whole space. For interested people we are going to show everything on the Zoom call  For someone who presents himself as the lead of the marketing team, you should definitely introduce yourself better. I understand when someone who has no marketing skills presents himself like this, but if you present your work like this, what should I or someone as a potential client expect?QuoteVouched and TrustedWho verified this?

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: ThomasGD on August 22, 2023, 07:17:56 AMHey, I am Thomas, the lead CM at Marketing10. We have an exceptionally experienced community management team, with a strong background in the dynamic world of Web3. I have been operating as CM since 2018, and as a marketing team have had the privilege of working with tier 1 projects. With a passion for community engagement and a wealth of industry knowledge, we are committed to delivering exceptional results in every project we undertake. We look forward to taking your project to the next level.If you are looking for a CM that you can trust, I am the right person. My monthly contract price is 500 $ /month.Interested? Let's book a Zoom call where I will present to you what I can bring in! You have mentioned vouched and trusted but in the description of the post, I have never seen who has vouched for you and how you are trusted. You have mentioned that you have experience in the community management service from 2018 but you have not mentioned any experience. If you really have experience then you should update that on the op.

comments.author: arabspaceship123
comments.body: Hello Thomas who's the team behind marketing10. Who's vouched for marketing10 saying it's trusted? If you don't have a working website you won't find clients if they'll see 404. I've located one site marketing10[dot]io is it yours?Quote from: ThomasGD on August 22, 2023, 07:17:56 AMHey, I am Thomas, the lead CM at Marketing10.

comments.author: ThomasGD
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on August 22, 2023, 10:35:28 PMQuote from: ThomasGD on August 22, 2023, 07:51:03 PMYes, I am working for a marketing firm that has 7 employees with different backgrounds. All I can say is that we are one of the best in the whole space. For interested people we are going to show everything on the Zoom call  For someone who presents himself as the lead of the marketing team, you should definitely introduce yourself better. I understand when someone who has no marketing skills presents himself like this, but if you present your work like this, what should I or someone as a potential client expect?QuoteVouched and TrustedWho verified this?Well, I expected to do this as a surprise once we connect on a Zoom call, you know, expect the unexpected and be pleasantly surprised   But yes, I see what you mean, if there won't be anyone interested then I am going to create a better post with a pitch deck. As for "Vouched and Trusted", we have worked and are working with many well-known projects, so I think there's more than enough trust.

comments.author: ThomasGD
comments.body: Quote from: arabspaceship123 on August 23, 2023, 12:19:41 AMHello Thomas who's the team behind marketing10. Who's vouched for marketing10 saying it's trusted? If you don't have a working website you won't find clients if they'll see 404. I've located one site marketing10[dot]io is it yours?https://i.ibb.co/X2ZVmVf/marketing10.jpgQuote from: ThomasGD on August 22, 2023, 07:17:56 AMHey, I am Thomas, the lead CM at Marketing10. Yes, we are actually rebranding right now, so it's offline.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: ThomasGD on August 23, 2023, 09:40:53 PMWell, I expected to do this as a surprise once we connect on a Zoom call, you know, expect the unexpected and be pleasantly surprised   But yes, I see what you mean, if there won't be anyone interested then I am going to create a better post with a pitch deck. It is certain that no one will be interested if they first have to talk to you and believe what you are saying. Even if you have outstanding negotiation skills, everyone will want some more tangible proof that you really do it.QuoteAs for "Vouched and Trusted", we have worked and are working with many well-known projects, so I think there's more than enough trust. You are still a newbie here with zero trust, who wants to introduce yourself via voice call, although this is a forum where people communicate in written text.Quote from: ThomasGD on August 23, 2023, 09:48:12 PMYes, we are actually rebranding right now, so it's offline.  As you can see, things like this show more about you than a Zoom call. Pretty unprofessional, isn't it?

comments.author: arabspaceship123
comments.body: Quote from: ThomasGD on August 23, 2023, 09:40:53 PMAs for "Vouched and Trusted", we have worked and are working with many well-known projects, so I think there's more than enough trust. Which projects have you worked with why aren't you telling names of famous projects you're trusted with. We don't know you so you're not trusted. If we don't know who's vouched for you how's it making trust. You should say their names.Quote from: ThomasGD on August 23, 2023, 09:48:12 PMYes, we are actually rebranding right now, so it's offline.  You shouldn't annouce projects until your website's ready. What's going to be achieved with zoom calls?
